definitions.definition: to forbid, to prohibit, to disallow, to ban [+ (dative) (genitive/infinitive) = (someone) from (something)]

parsedExamples.example: Rodzice zakazali dzieciom grać w gry komputerowe.
parsedExamples.translation: The parents have forbidden their children to play computer games.

examples: Rodzice zakazali dzieciom grać w gry komputerowe.
